modName: Xavier Pendragon from  Eternal Champions and bonus guy

descriptionHtml:
Xavier Pendragon frum Eternal Champions +robes
............................................................................................

(((i don't use Skyrim:Creation Kit so no esp)) sorry
............................................................................................
Xavier Pendragon  bio


Full Name: Xavier Pendragon 
Occupation: Warlock/Alchemist taking up the study of alchemy, including being a blacksmith/farrier)
Time Zone: 1692 A.D. (you will no doubt instantly recognize that as the year that the Salem Witch Trials began)
location: Salem 
Fighting Style: Hapkido Cane Fighting / alchemy
know spells/powers  turns you to stone

Bio in Brief: After failing at being a blacksmith, drastically, Xavier turned to his original love: science.  He began experimenting with alchemy and rather than finding a way to turn lead into gold he discovered a way to create a source of cheap, clean-burning energy.  This discovery also fundamentally changed him giving him some powers which seemed like magic, but were completely scientific (the instruction manual claimed).  Unfortunately the people of Salem didn't like hippies back then any more than they liked witches and he was seized and (burned at the stake) for being a warlock before he could reveal his OPEC wrecking secrets to the world.
.....................................................................................


mods need it for this to work

  Grim Reaper Hoods mod (for the hood)

 http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22296




 install 

  
  install  Grim Reaper Hoods mod
  install  Xavier Pendragon+robes just drop date 
  install  his staff pick one thin drop date




  ((if you us  Staves of Skyrim mod theres a staff for you to))
...................................................................................

credit

 (Kempalot) for the Grim Reaper Hoods mod with out it the hoods won't be what tha are
